message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.CV 

The paper discusses autonomous learning of multiple tasks, which is a common topic in machine learning and artificial intelligence. The use of reinforcement learning and the focus on task selection suggest that the paper is likely to belong to the sub-category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of robotics, which suggests that it may also belong to the sub-category of cs.RO (Robotics). The paper also discusses the interrelated nature of tasks, which is a common topic in the sub-category of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The use of MDPs suggests that the paper may also belong to the sub-category of cs.SY (Systems and Control). Finally, the paper may also belong to the sub-category of cs.CV (Computer Vision) if the tasks involve visual perception.
